definition: cup/trophy cup/classifier for certain containers of liquids: glass, cup

sentences.english: With that, he held up the leaves and the goblet to show the king.
sentences.chinese: 說完了之後，他拿出葉子和酒杯呈給國王看。

sentences.english: "Vino Nobile" is the starter series into the world of beverage-specific glasses.
sentences.chinese: “諾柏酒杯”開創了世界上飲料特效杯的新紀元。

sentences.english: The flagon contains precisely eight cups of wine.
sentences.chinese: 它就是一壺酒剛好倒滿八隻酒杯。

sentences.english: And the next thing I know, I am on the ground harvesting chanterelles.
sentences.chinese: 不知不覺的，我又在地上撿酒杯蘑菇了。

sentences.english: Door locks on automobiles and most high-security locks have pin tumblers.
sentences.chinese: 門鎖和汽車最高級的安全鎖有腳酒杯。

sentences.english: The story was of the Buddhist monk and the goblet.
sentences.chinese: 這則故事是關於一個佛教僧人和一個酒杯的故事。

sentences.english: Love is enriched life as a cup full of wine .
sentences.chinese: 愛是充實了的生命，正如盛滿了酒的酒杯。

sentences.english: With legs slightly down, raising his glass to his chest.
sentences.chinese: 說着雙腿微跪，酒杯舉到戰友胸前。

sentences.english: The UK government proudly unveiled a shatterproof pint glass on Thursday.
sentences.chinese: 英國政府於上週四高調推出一種防碎玻璃酒杯。

sentences.english: The tumblers in this type of lock are small pins.
sentences.chinese: 在這種鎖定類型的酒杯的小針。

sentences.english: He goes with Kohane to get glasses.
The liquor soaked the bedspread as the glass fell to the carpet and rolled against the wall.
sentences.chinese: 酒灑在牀單上，酒杯掉在地毯上滾到了牆邊。

sentences.english: Life has become richer by the love that has been lost.
sentences.chinese: 愛就是充實了的生命，正如盛滿了酒的酒杯。

sentences.english: Eoue is life in its fullness like the cup with its wine.
sentences.chinese: 愛就是充實的生命，正如盛滿了酒的酒杯。

sentences.english: I nodded to him and raised my drink and we both sipped at the drinks.
sentences.chinese: 我朝他點點頭，舉起酒杯，兩人都呷了一口。

definition: to drain the cup in one gulp (idiom)
to toast sb (with wine etc)/to drink a toast
to heave/to lift/to raise up/to uphold
to drink a toast/Cheers! (proposing a toast)/Here's to you!/Bottoms up!/lit. dry cup
tea prepared in large quantity using inexpensive tea leaves
